name: Waitiaki Dairy
description:
On the banks of the Waitiaki, one of the many waterways that carry life from mountains to sea in Aotearoa New Zealand, there is a small dairy farm. 

Sadly, over the years, intensive industrial farming practices have left the pastures muddy and lifeless, and the river, once a precious taonga for the community and life surrounding it, is choked with smothering toxic algae.

But now you have an opportunity to change things, when you buy the unprofitable land for a bargain. Can you show kaitiakitanga for the farm, restoring fertility, diversity of life and productivity, and bring mauri back to the Waitiaki?
